attributes.action: Open Marijuana Coffee Shops like Holland or Dispensaries to earn Tax from sales.
attributes.additional_details:
Holland make a Vast amount of Revenue from the tax charged on Coffee Shops our Country would benifit from the extra Money, there would be less young people commiting crime and Gang activities as most trouble is caused by the sale of Marijuana.
It has been proven over the past 60 years that Marijuana does not cause serious harm to the body or brain, Alcohol and tobacco are legal even though they cause serious harm to the body and brain.
The Government can start by making it legal to prescribe Marijuana to patients that need pain relief etc.and then slowley introduce dispenceries like in some parts of the U.S.A with medical cards(California made $2 Billion in a year from sales) The U.K could set up Grow Farms at a very low cost and have medical grade marijuana avalible all year round without having to import from over seas, meaning all profit goes to our Country.
